tool.name: Quality format converter
tool.help:
**What it does**
Converts a Solexa FASTQ file to/from numeric or ASCII quality format.
.. class:: warningmark
Re-scaling is **not** performed. (e.g. conversion from Phred scale to Solexa scale).
